nouns.description: souvlaki (countable and uncountable, plural souvlakis or souvlakia)

entries.meaning: A Greek fast food consisting of pieces of meat and sometimes vegetables grilled on a skewer, variously also called kalamaki or kebab or, in sandwich form, gyro or shawarma.
A wrapped pancake dish filled with meat, salad and some kind of sauce or dressing, commonly called a kebab.
